title: A cellulose monolithic stir bar for sorptive extraction of glycerol from biodiesel
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17380-17388
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02985B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Pablo H. S. Martins, Maria A. Barros, Caroline L. Silva, Poliana Ricci, Laís M. B. Castilho, Allyson L. R. Santos, Hugo S. Rodrigues, Rosana M. N. Assunção, Anizio M. Faria
Cellulose monoliths were used as stir-bar adsorbents in SBSE to extract glycerol from biodiesel samples with HPLC-RID analyses. The proposed method dispenses derivatizing reagents or sophisticated apparatus and uses water as the desorption eluent.
